message:
Hello Rishav,

I believe you must have had a good weekend?

This idea came to mind and I quickly thought to drop it here.

From the real estate marketplace, I want us to link all services together.
For instance.

People can actually see a listing at the marketplace and choose rent financing or mortgage by a click of a button and it will direct them to either page, where they can start the process…

So typically, the rent finance or mortgage button is by default on every property listing in the site…

We can build on this when we discuss this week please…

Thank you
